title: Captain America Golden Age fills
description:
C A P T A I N   A M E R I C A   GOLDEN-AGE FILLS
Timely-Atlas





This torrent includes new paper scans of:



CAPTAIN AMERICA (Timely) 5, 7, 8, 65
CAPTAIN AMERICA (Atlas) 76  
MEN&#039;S ADVENTURES 27
YOUNG MEN 27  (Human Torch, Captain America, Sub-Mariner)

Plus the articles:

THE ORIGIN OF MARVEL COMICS By George Olshelvski
COMICS BETWEEN THE PANELS By S. Duin & M. Richardson









All are sharp new scans from original paper source.
Probably the best scans ever made of Timely Cap comics.
Note that in my previous

Captain America Golden Age torrent:

Cap 5 and 7 were reprints
Cap 8 was fiche
Cap 65 was missing

The new scan of Cap 76 is an improvement over the one in my previous torrent.
Moreover I am including Men&#039;s Adventures 27 and Young Men 27 since
they contain  Cap stories (also Human Torch and Sub-Mariner).
These are also new paper scans.





And, as bonus, two interesting articles related to these comics
are also included.

Thanks a lot to the scanners.
Enjoy and seed.
